titleStmt.title: The writing schoolemaster or The anatomy of faire writing. Wherein is exactlie expressed each severall character. Together with other rules and documents coincident to the art of faire & speedy writing. / By Io: Dauies of Hereford.
titleStmt.author: Davies, John, 1565?-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: Are to be sold by Roger Daniell at ye Angell in Lumbord street,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, oval surrounding Davies' portrait in frontispiece has 'PROTRAITVRE'.
Reproduction of original in the Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, Cambridge, England.
